about_the_game:
As the noble houses dispute over Queen's Zefya's claim and ascension to the throne has escalated to a civil war, for the first time after centuries, and under one king the Ulniir forces march towards the civil-war torn capital of Roverford.

Play as the scion of a Noble house or join an Ulniir Tribe and experience the war first hand. Shape your Dreams into powerful magic with the Dreamshaper and her Soulmate. Expand your tactics with over 635+ new cards and experiment with brand new mechanics in an all new adventure mode.

The fate of Folkswave lies in your hands...



  • New Alliances: Join different Factions and gain access to their unique Allies & Actions.
  • Expanded Race Card Sets: Give freshness to your runs with expanded racial card sets and allies.
  • New Unlockable Archetypes: Unlock & Play as an Ulniir, a Noble Scion or a Dreamshaper.
  • New Adventure Areas: Adventure in new areas, visit new locations and beat new Challenges.
  • Conquest Mode: A harder adventure mode featuring several new mechanics.
  • New Legendary Weapons & Actions: Experience the power of Demigods and yield mighty Tier 9 Weapons & Actions.
  • New Enemies & Bosses: Spice up your runs with 136 new Enemies (19 new Bosses & 117 new 'Normal' enemies for mid-high level characters.)

content_descriptors.notes:
Erannorth Reborn contains references to Nudity, Fantasy Drugs (herbal infusions, potions etc.) and Alcohol.

Artworks of Playable Characters, Cards & Enemies (both Female and Male) are (under) dressed, in revealing and skimpy outfits that show off plenty of skin, cleavage and may contain partial or full Nudity.

As the noble houses dispute over Queen's Zefya's claim and ascension to the throne has escalated to a civil war, for the first time after centuries, and under one king the Ulniir forces march towards the civil-war torn capital of Roverford.

Play as the scion of a Noble house or join an Ulniir Tribe and experience the war first hand. Shape your Dreams into powerful magic with the Dreamshaper and her Soulmate. Expand your tactics with over 635+ new cards and experiment with brand new mechanics in an all new adventure mode.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 x64
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Quad Core CPU or Better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX12 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
